item.title: 米調査官は145ページの報告書で、米グローバルメディア庁を指揮するトランプ大統領の任命権者による権力の乱用が、「ミッションを危険にさらす」と詳述した（David Folkenflik/NPR)
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
In a 145-page report, US investigators detail abuses of power by Trump's appointee helming the US Agency for Global Media that put its “missions at risk”  —  On the day after his confirmation as chief executive of the U.S. Agency for Global Media in June 2020 …

item.title: ゲーム、ワークアウト、VRなど、リスナーの動きに合わせて録音された音楽をリアルタイムで調整し、特注のサウンドトラックを作成する「ダイナミック・ミュージック」技術を利用したスタートアップの方法（Kristin Robinson/Billboard)
item.description:
Kristin Robinson / Billboard:
How startups use “dynamic music” tech to adapt recorded music and create bespoke soundtracks in real time attuned to listeners' moves in games, workouts, and VR  —  Cutting edge technology now allows music to change its shape to fit our virtual and real world lives.

item.title: 女優・映画監督、AI活用の強いルールが導入されない限り「どんな労働行為も我々のビジネスに有効」なのは今が最後と主張（Justine Bateman/Newsweek）
item.description:
Justine Bateman / Newsweek:
An actress and filmmaker argues now is the last time “any labor action will be effective in our business”, unless strong rules for the use of AI are introduced  —  What does it mean to be human?  —  You look human, you act human, you learn lessons, you have challenges, you feel emotions.

item.title: 政治担当編集者がメッセンジャーを辞めた。情報筋は、競合他社の記事をもとに記事を量産する要求をめぐる組織の混乱と緊張を詳述している（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）。
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
A politics editor quits The Messenger; sources detail organizational confusion and tensions over demands to mass-produce articles based on competitors' stories  —  The company's high-volume approach to digital publishing has led to duplicated stories and alienated some of its journalists.

item.title: ポッドキャスト「The Blog Era」で、準匿名出版物のネットワークがヒップホップを作り変えた時代を描く、エリックとジェフのローゼンタール兄弟へのインタビュー（Reggie Ugwu/New York Times）です。
item.description:
Reggie Ugwu / New York Times:
An interview with brothers Eric and Jeff Rosenthal, whose podcast The Blog Era chronicles the time when a network of quasi-anonymous publications remade hip-hop  —  The new podcast from the brothers Eric and Jeff Rosenthal explores what made hip-hop blogs matter — and why they faded away.

item.title: SCOTUSのGonzalez v. GoogleとTwitter v. Taamnehの判決を見て、なぜトーマス判事が230条の存在について説明したのか、インターネットにとって良い兆しだと思う (Mike Masnick/Techdirt)
item.description:
Mike Masnick / Techdirt:
A look at SCOTUS' Gonzalez v. Google and Twitter v. Taamneh rulings and why Justice Thomas' explanation for Section 230's existence bodes well for the internet  —  Our long national wait for how the Supreme Court would rule regarding Section 230 is over, and the answer is... we need to keep waiting.

item.title: Bandcampの労働者は、31対7で労働組合Bandcamp Unitedの結成に賛成し、NLRBによる認証を待ち、その後団体交渉が行われる（Raphael Helfand/The Fader）。
item.description:
Raphael Helfand / The Fader:
Bandcamp workers vote 31-7 in favor of forming the union Bandcamp United and await certification by the NLRB, to be followed by a collective bargaining process  —  Bandcamp workers voted 31-7 today in favor of forming Bandcamp United.  —  Back in March, a year after their company was purchased …

item.title: 2023年4月に米国がロシア人ジャーナリストへのビザを拒否したのに続き、2度目のロシアがWSJのエヴァン・ガーシュコビッチ記者の訪問を求める米国当局の要求を拒否（William Mauldin/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
William Mauldin / Wall Street Journal:
For the second time, Russia rejects US officials' request to visit WSJ reporter Evan Gershkovich, after the US denied visas to Russian journalists in April 2023  —  In barring U.S. officials from visiting Evan Gershkovich, Moscow blames Washington over visa status of its reporters

item.title: NPR初のラテン系視聴者向け編集者であるPablo Valdivia氏とのQ&A：その役割の3つの柱、その影響、他のニュースルームが同様のポジションを設けることなど（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab)
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
Q&A with Pablo Valdivia, NPR's first editor for Latino audiences, on the role's three prongs, its impact, other newsrooms creating similar positions, and more  —  “The weight of coverage shouldn't have to fall on the shoulders of a select few, but rather on the organization as a whole.

item.title: バイデン大統領のオーストラリア旅行が直前でキャンセルされ、メディア各社は多額の請求書を突きつけられたが、このような旅行はほとんどのメディアにとって非現実的なコストであることを示した（Paul Farhi/Washington Post）
item.description:
Paul Farhi / Washington Post:
President Biden's last-minute Australia trip cancellation stuck media outlets with big bills, showing that such trips are impractically costly for most outlets  —  Some correspondents think it could prompt media bosses to pull back from covering the president on future overseas tours

item.title: ユーチューバーのハンク・グリーンがホジキンリンパ腫と診断され、化学療法を受け、一部のプロジェクトを休止することを発表（Jason P. Frank/Vulture）
item.description:
Jason P. Frank / Vulture:
YouTube star Hank Green announces that he has been diagnosed with Hodgkin lymphoma, will undergo chemotherapy, and will take a break from some of his projects  —  YouTube icon and TikTok uncle Hank Green announced May 19 that he has been diagnosed with Hodgkin's lymphoma, a cancer of the blood.

item.title: 情報源はこちらAmazonはPrime Video Channelsのストリーミングサービスの利用料を50%カット、YouTubeはPrimetime Channelsの利用料を40%以下にしている（Sahil Patel/The Information）
item.description:
Sahil Patel / The Information:
Sources: Amazon takes a 50% subscription fee cut for the streaming services on Prime Video Channels while YouTube is offering 40% or less for Primetime Channels  —  YouTube and Netflix are the most-watched streaming services in America.  But it is Amazon that has come closest to building …

item.title: ABC NewsがThe EconomistのG. Elliott Morrisをニュース部門のデータ分析担当編集ディレクターとして採用、FiveThirtyEightの統括を含む（Ted Johnson/Deadline）．
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
ABC News hires The Economist's G. Elliott Morris as its editorial director of data analytics for the news division, which includes overseeing FiveThirtyEight  —  EXCLUSIVE: ABC News is hiring The Economist's G. Elliott Morris to be the editorial director of data analytics for the news division …

item.title: ソースはこちらインスタカートの2022年の広告収入は〜7億4000万ドル、前年比30％増、3割近くが2019年に開始した広告ユニットによるもの（Cory Weinberg/The Information）
item.description:
Cory Weinberg / The Information:
Source: Instacart generated ~$740M in 2022 ad revenue, up 30% YoY; nearly 30% of the company's 2022 revenue came from its ads unit, which launched in 2019  —  Instacart has become an advertising powerhouse.  —  The grocery-delivery firm's ad revenue totaled about $740 million last year …

item.title: 中国のコメディアンLi Haoshiは、ソーシャルメディアに投稿された軍事ジョークにより、警察の捜査と彼のマネージメント会社に210万ドルの罰金に直面している（Edward White/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Edward White / Financial Times:
Chinese comedian Li Haoshi faces a police investigation and his management company a $2.1M fine after he made a military joke that was posted on social media  —  Punchline referring to military slogan sparks uproar and gloom over free expression in China  —  Ad-libbing during a stand-up routine is second nature for a comedian.
